remarks: Lemma for ~ joinval2 and ~ joineu .  (Contributed by NM, 12-Sep-2018.) TODO: combine this through joineu into joinlem?
statement:
joinval2.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
joinval2.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
joinval2.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
joinval2.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. V ) $.
joinval2.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
joinval2.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
joinval2lem $p |- ( ( X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( ( A. y e. { X , Y } y .<_ x /\ A. z e. B ( A. y e. { X , Y } y .<_ z -> x .<_ z ) ) <-> ( ( X .<_ x /\ Y .<_ x ) /\ A. z e. B ( ( X .<_ z /\ Y .<_ z ) -> x .<_ z ) ) ) ) $.
$d .<_ y $.
$d .\/ x z $.
$d B x z $.
$d K x y z $.
$d X x y z $.
$d Y x y z $.
